amendment.description: Amendment sought to extend the availability of assistance authorized under the American Dream Downpayment Act by 3 months.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to extend funding for the American Dream Downpayment Act by 3 months.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 269).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
